object.name: sword long the
object.description: THE long sword of Primus is here.

extra_description.description:
This is an extremely long and heavy sword, with many magical runes inscribed
on it.  It glows with the power of Primus, Lord of the Plane of Nirvana.

object.name: moonstone moon stone white
object.description: A softly glowing white stone rests on the floor.

extra_description.description:
Looking into the smooth surface of this moonstone, you feel strangely at 
peace and balance with the world around you.
